page.title: 01Coniston area main features.
page.content:
This is an area of{outstanding natural {beauty }within the Lake District National Park, Cumbria. The main features of the block are:
* The N. end of{Coniston Water * High ground rising to 460m to the W. of Coniston Water * The small village of{Coniston, between the high ground and the lake * E. of the lake, high ground up to 210m, rising through ancient deciduous woodland to the W. edge of{Grizedale Forest.
Most of this block is upland; rough grazing and bare rock. The lowland surrounding the lake is a mixture of pasture and woodland.
